Name: Pixross
About the game: Pixross is a picture logic puzzle game featuring 170+ unique puzzles, customization and extra challenges for each puzzle. Unlock new puzzle packs or customization options by completing puzzles! Hundreds of challenging puzzles – Each puzzle pack has a specific theme, you can unlock new packs by completing puzzles. Add extra challenges – Add challenges to puzzles like clues that disappear, mirroring or only allowing a single mistake to be made! Customize to your liking – Next to changing the game rules you'll also be able to unlock and customize the visuals like backgrounds, tiles and fonts (50 options). The game can only be played using a mouse. Windows and Linux compatible, not compatible with other operating systems.
